code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?'/api':'/api';export const getContent=async function(domain){let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/content/").concat(domain,"?limit=").concat(limit));return response.data;};export const getContentSummary=async(domain,id)=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/content/").concat(domain,"/").concat(id,"/summary"));return response.data;};export const getContentExplanation=async(domain,id)=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/content/").concat(domain,"/").concat(id,"/explain"));return response.data;};export const getMicroBreakContent=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/content/random/microbreak"));return response.data;};export const askQuestion=async function(question){let domain=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/chat/ask"),{question,domain});return response.data;};export const generateQuiz=async topic=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/chat/quiz"),{topic});return response.data;};export const getProgress=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/progress"));return response.data;};export const updateProgress=async function(topic){let quizScore=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/progress/update"),{topic,quizScore});return response.data;};export const checkQuizAnswer=async(question,userAnswer,correctAnswer,topic)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/quiz/check"),{question,userAnswer,correctAnswer,topic});return response.data;};
